string-array.name: topic_sqls
string-array.item: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "topics" ("tid" TEXT NOT NULL, "title" TEXT, "thumb" TEXT, "letter" TEXT, "checked" INTEGER DEFAULT 0, "_id" INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, UNIQUE("tid" ASC) ON CONFLICT REPLACE);
